name: Wasteland (itch) (danielpaine91)
description:
Game Summary: 

Survive against hordes of berserk weaponized robotic AI. How long can you survive? 

Story:

After mankind started manufacturing AI controlled robots, a virus appeared that caused everything steered by microprocessors/programmed go berserk.
Self-steered robot factories went out of control and started producing hordes of  manufactured machines that wander the world in blind aggression.
The process of production has been warped so much that the machines are now radioactive, toxic to humans; their motor oil is toxic. The places where their remains gather can get permanently toxic.

Credits:

Daniel Paine - Programmer/Implementation 

Ben Hopkins - UI/Prop Modelling/Texturing 

Katarzyna Kaminska - Character/Robot Modelling Texturing

Filip Koziel - Turret Implementation/Audio Implementation

Note: We have plans for future with new features, polish  and sorting known bugs. This was a 2 week project for University which we really enjoyed to make and play. Over Christmas period we will be making updates to the game.

Please leave suggestions, bugs and comments - alternatively you can email me at danielpaine@hotmail.co.uk
